import{applyMiddleware,compose,createStore}from"redux";import reducers from"./reducers";import{routerMiddleware}from"react-router-redux";import{createBrowserHistory}from"history";import thunk from'redux-thunk';var history=createBrowserHistory();var routeMiddleware=routerMiddleware(history);var middlewares=[thunk,routeMiddleware];var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;export default function configureStore(initialState){var store=createStore(reducers,initialState,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares)));if(module.hot){// Enable Webpack hot module replacement for reducers
module.hot.accept('./reducers',function(){var nextRootReducer=require('./reducers');store.replaceReducer(nextRootReducer);});}return store;}export{history};
